text: Philippe Audet (born June 4, 1977) is a Canadian former professional ice hockey player. Audet was born in Ottawa, Ontario. As a youth, he played in the 1991 Quebec International Pee-Wee Hockey Tournament with a minor ice hockey team from Beauce, Quebec. He was drafted by the Detroit Red Wings 52nd overall in the 1995 NHL Entry Draft, later playing with that team in the National Hockey League. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1977 births Category:Adirondack Red Wings players Category:Canadian ice hockey left wingers Category:Cincinnati Mighty Ducks players Category:Detroit Red Wings players Category:Granby Bisons players Category:Granby Pr√©dateurs players Category:Ice hockey people from Ottawa Category:Springfield Falcons players Category:Living people
title: Philippe Audet
